    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2028</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Organer - Quiz</string>
            <string language="en">Organs-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organ-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Organe-Jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órgão-organs-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organo-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όργανο-διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">O'rgano-Concurso</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvor mye kan du om organene i kroppen vår? klarer du alle riktig på et forsøk?</string>
            <string language="en">What do you know about the organs in our body? Can you get all questions correct on one attempt?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">organer</string>
            <string language="en">Organs</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was kennen Sie über die Organe in unserem 
Körper? Können Sie alle Fragen korrekt erhalten auf einem 
Versuch?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que connaissez-vous les organes dans notre corps 
? Pouvez-vous obtenir toutes les questions correctes sur une 
tentative ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que você sabe sobre os órgãos em nosso corpo? 
Pode você começar todas as perguntas corretas em uma 
tentativa?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa conoscete circa gli organi nel nostro 
corpo? Potete ottenere tutte le domande corrette su un 
tentativo?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι ξέρετε για τα όργανα στο σώμα μας; Μπορείτε 
να πάρετε όλες τις ερωτήσεις σωστές σε μια προσπάθεια;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué usted sabe sobre los órganos en nuestro 
cuerpo? ¿Puede usted conseguir todas las preguntas correctas en 
una tentativa?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Organes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órgãos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όργανα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órganos</string>
          </keyword>
